short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message any number on WhatsApp quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Simple lets you open in Whatsapp any number highlighted on the screen.

Highlight number -> Left Click -> Send Message on Whatsapp

You can even create templates for your Whatsapp messages
